attributes.action: change current legislation and implement tougher restrictions on air rifles/guns/similar.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call upon the Prime Minister to prevent and call a halt to the increasing number of incidents involving children, adults, animals and property being injured, killed or damaged by air rifles/guns/similar. Increase the age of ownership from 17 to 21. A change in the law now to prohibit anyone under 21 from owning, buying or using air arms. All air arms to be licensed regardless of firing capacity/power. More stringent policing and fines for misuse. The RSPCA supports imposing licences on all air arms and other restrictions due to high increase in animals being injured or killed by air arms.
